# DefaultGroupBoxStyle

**Structure**

The default style for group box views.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DefaultGroupBoxStyle
```

## Overview

You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/GroupBoxStyle/automatic] to construct this style.

## Creating the group box style

- **init()**

## Conforms To

- GroupBoxStyle
